overview: Brooklyn, NY. At the next stop, Adam is sure that the girl of his dreams will get on the bus and sit next to him. But when he opens his eyes, all he finds is a pineapple. This is the beginning of a strange relationship between the two, that nobody seems to understand. Nobody, except maybe Kathleen
tagline: Adam was waiting for love, until the day Pina appeared. But Pina... is a pineapple
title: Adam's Pineapple
